lead_paragraph: A 49-year-old woman died and her older brother was seriously injured after a blaze spread smoke through the three-story building where they lived together, officials said.

headline.main: Brooklyn Woman Dies in Apartment Building Fire; Brother Is Injured
headline.print_headline: Woman Dies in Apartment Building Fire; Brother Is Injured

snippet: A 49-year-old woman died and her older brother was seriously injured after a blaze spread smoke through the three-story building where they lived together, officials said.
